servinfo.title: Immobilizer Indicator Light Remains ON after Engine Start

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram:Petrol Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Indicator Light Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine at Stop:Petrol Engine Model .

test1.ptxt: Check DTC referring to DTC Check:Petrol Engine Model

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.
Substitute a known-good combination meter and recheck. If still indicator light remains ON, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
